neuron_network

Class NetworkData

  • java.lang.Object
    • neuron_network.NetworkData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>>

    public class NetworkData
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>>
    This class stores a lot of inputs of the Neuron Network with their desired output. That info is useful to be used in a MultilayerPerceptron network.
    Version:
    1.0

      • reload_data

        public void reload_data(java.lang.String file)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        It parses a file to load all data stored in it. The file must have a header with 3 numbers. First number will tell input's length. Second number will tell the ouput's length. And last number will tell the number of patrons stored. Then each line will be an instance of the Neuron Network. First input values will be parsed as input and the rest output values will be parsed as output.
        Parameters:
        file - The path as string of the data file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - it throws a IOException if the file does not exist
        java.io.IOException - if the file has a wrong structure.

      • clearData

        public void clearData()
        It removes all data stored
